ModMetaData.name: Animal Overhaul
ModMetaData.author: kaptain_kavern
ModMetaData.description:
A collection of patches and tweaks regarding animals :
-= 1.0 - "Konrad Lorenz Edition" =-
Focused on animal behavior.
Changes are : - Chinchillas, Rhinoceros, Ostriches, Turkeys, Chickens, Pigs, Cows, Rat, WildBoars, Monkey, Wargs and all wolves are now herd animals. - Pets sets to follow master while fieldwork will now consider DoctorRescue, ReleasePrisoner, Slaughter/Milk/Shear/Train, Harvest/Cut, Strip/Bury/Haul Corpses and CleanClearSnow as fieldwork. - All bears, Alpacas, Rhinoceros and Elephants can now be used as pack animals and will be used by other factions
